title: Adapters
description: Adapters build & bundle your routes and automatically provide a translation layer between Svarta routes and the underlying platform. Depending on the chosen adapter, it may also provide a way to automatically deploy your application.

children.value: Adapters build & bundle your routes and automatically provide a translation layer between Svarta routes and the underlying platform. Depending on the chosen adapter, it may also provide a way to automatically deploy your application.

Adapters build & bundle your routes and automatically provide a translation layer between Svarta routes and the underlying platform. Depending on the chosen adapter, it may also provide a way to automatically deploy your application.
